about_the_game:
"Journey with Cats" is an action-adventure puzzle game where you play as a clever and courageous young girl embarking on a journey to find her mother.

An ancient civilization sends out a mysterious call. The protagonist, alongside three uniquely spirited cats, explores ancient ruins, switching between the girl and the cats to push stones, slip through gaps, and overcome numerous challenges together.

Travel through dense forests, dive into the deep sea, and visit the Alto civilization to uncover hidden secrets.

Over 40 meticulously designed puzzles and mechanisms will test your wits and observation skills.

Control three distinct feline companions, utilizing their special abilities to clear obstacles!

The guardians of Alto will stand in your way—defeat them with wisdom and courage!

  • Switch between the girl and the cats for a unique gameplay experience.

  • Engage in thrilling battles against powerful bosses.

  • Make use of the cats’ unique abilities to navigate challenges.

  • Solve a variety of intricate puzzles and mechanisms.

Start your adventure in "Journey with Cats", travel to the Alto civilization, and help Mia uncover her mother’s whereabouts. A wide range of achievements awaits players—set off on this journey with your three feline companions!

short_description: "Journey with Cats" is a cute and relaxing action-puzzle game. Switch freely between controlling a girl and a cat, solve clever puzzles, explore the ancient Alto civilization, and defeat unruly guardians. Embark on an exciting adventure with three cats to find your mother!
